const response = await client.index({
  index: "exams",
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    grade: [1, 2, 3],
    weight: 2,
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.search({
  index: "exams",
  size: 0,
  aggs: {
    weighted_grade: {
      weighted_avg: {
        value: {
          field: "grade",
        },
        weight: {
          field: "weight",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
